name: HJfod's Menu Animations Reborn
description: HJfod's menu animations mod from 2.1, ported to Geode!

classic-play-button-anim.name: Classic Play Button Animation
classic-play-button-anim.description: Use the original animation for the Play button (that big button at dead center of the screen).

reverse-side-menus.name: Reverse Side Menu Animation Order
reverse-side-menus.description: Switches from the default "bottom to top" animation order to "top to bottom" animation order.

close-menu-delay.name: Close Menu Delay
close-menu-delay.description:
Adjust the delay for the close menu.

<cy>For closing the game more gracefully without having to wait for the animation to finish.</c>
